reviews.title: Great place for a easy vacation
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here Wed - Sat. for a quick vacation. I wasn't sure about the hotel b/c he booked it on his own & the name is a little funky. But the place exceeded all my expectations & I wouldn't stay elsewhere in Montauk. Born Free is a small hotel about 1/2 block off the beach and 2 blocks from Nicks (good nightlife/happy hour). There are about 20 rooms & the building is only 2 stories high. From the second story you can see the ocean. It's located right near an entrance to the public beach and about 1.5 blocks to the main town. Great location! Born Free rooms are more like suites than hotel rooms - they have a pullout sofa in case you have more than 2 people & they have kitchenette's if you feel like doing your own cooking or keeping food on-hand for breakfast/lunch/etc. Another bonus is that the Born Free hotel has WiFi. Which means I can sit on the porch, hear the ocean & get some work done. They clean your place daily - new towels, etc. And the staff is laid-back & very helpful. It's about a $8 cab ride from the train station if you don't have a car. I would definitely recommend this property!

likes.disliked: — There are stairs to get to all rooms so if you can't manage stairs this isn't the place for you

reviews.title: Pretty darn nice
reviews.text: We found the room to be clean and quiet. The bedroom had air conditioning but the screens on the windows were old with some holes.. we had to leave air on instead of getting a breeze. The place had everything from coffee maker to pots and dishes! Overall its a great location and very clean, we were happy and would go again.

My husband, daughter and myself stayed here while visiting friends in Montauk. We had heard not so good things from people who have stayed here 2 years ago so we were a bit nervous but needed a place to stay. I can honestly tell you that this is possibly one of the best motels I have ever stayed in. It was clean, everything was new, the bathroom was nicer then my own! I highly recommend this as a place to stay while staying in Montauk.....

reviews.text: We used to stay at another hotel nearby but when the management there changed we looked elsewhere and were very pleased to book at the Born Free.
reviews.title: Best place in Montauk for teh money!

likes.disliked: — Nothing negative to say at all!

reviews.text: We have been going there about 6-7 years now and it is by far the best value for the money in Montauk. In fact, we love it so much that sometimes we will come out for a weekend in the winter.
reviews.title: Good value for the quality

reviews.text: I found the Born Free because they allow dogs for a small daily fee. I've stayed at all different times of the year and have had a wonderful relaxing time. The beach is across the street, the town is around the corner, supermarket down the block. Just perfect. We bbq on the grills, use the picnic table and sit on the porch having cocktails or coffee depending on the time of day. Great for families or just getting away by yourself.
reviews.title: Animal Friendly
Basic but Good value!
reviews.text: This really looks like a motel but it is a bunch of small apartments with full kitchens. There are no other amenities, but it is across the street from the beach (Only partial views as there is another hotel across the street), and it is walking distance to one of the main drags in town. It was clean and the staff were very pleasant. The rates for June were excellent; they seem pricey for July, but that's the peak season I guess. I will absolutely stay there again--this summer if I can.
